summary: A gangster is put in prison, but finds salvation through music while serving his time. Again on the outside, he finds success elusive and temptations abound.
cast: Richard Barthelmess|Betty Compson|William Holden|Louis Natheaux|George E. Stone|Ray Turner|Gladden James|Ernie Adams|Brooks Benedict|Ruth Cherrington|James Conaty|Richard Cramer|Edwards Davis|Sally Eilers|Jim Farley|Sherry Hall|Chuck Hamilton|Pat Harmon|Ernest Hilliard|Bob Kortman|Louis Mercier|Robert Emmett O'Connor|Virginia Sale|Randolph Scott|Harry Semels|Charles Sullivan|Fred Warren|Blue Washington
title: Weary River
